summary: Jonathan Harker begets the ire of Count Dracula after he accepts a job at the vampire's castle under false pretenses, forcing his colleague Dr. Van Helsing to destroy the predatory villain when he targets Harker's loved ones.
cast: Peter Cushing|Christopher Lee|Michael Gough|Melissa Stribling|Carol Marsh|Olga Dickie|John Van Eyssen|Valerie Gaunt|Janina Faye|Barbara Archer|Charles Lloyd Pack|George Merritt|George Woodbridge|George Benson|Miles Malleson|Geoffrey Bayldon|Paul Cole|Stedwell Fulcher|Humphrey Kent|John Maxim|Antic Melkior|Guy Mills|Richard Morgan|John Mossman|Judith Nelmes|William Sherwood
